title: Process Monthly Owner Distribution
description: It's the end of the month, and the PM needs to calculate and process the net rental income payment to a property owner.

tasks.description: Reconcile the property's income and expenses for the month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies all rents have been recorded and all vendor invoices have been paid.

tasks.description: Calculate the net operating income and subtract the management fee to determine the owner distribution amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the final payment amount due to the owner.

tasks.description: Initiate an ACH transfer for the distribution amount to the owner's bank account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The payment is successfully processed through the payment system.
